title: First World Congress on Women's Mental Health
abstract: This Congress will be held in Berlin, Germany, from 27 to 31 March 2001. For further information, please contact Dr Mario Lanczik, Congress President, Department of Psychiatry, University of Erlangen, Schwabachanlage 6, D-91054 Erlangen, Germany. Fax: +49 9131 853 6592. E-mail: lanczik@psych.med.uni-erlangen.de
